document.full_text: tunisia's coast guard said on sunday it had recovered the bodies of 26 people who drowned when boats carrying them illegally to europe got into difficulty, taking to 176 the total number retrieved from the sea so far.
document.title: tunisia finds 26 more bodies from refugee shipwreck
lines_and_colors: tunisia's coast guard said on sunday it had recovered the bodies of 26 people who drowned when boats carrying them illegally to europe got into difficulty, taking to 176 the total number retrieved from the sea so far.
